verses.verse: All the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H5414>cried;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> that <S%H3915>night.<s%>

All the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3885>murmured<s%> against <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and against <S%H175>Aaron:<s%> and the whole <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3863>them,<s%> "Would that we had <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt!<s%> or <S%H3863>would<s%> that we had <S%H4191>died<s%> in this <S%H4057>wilderness!<s%>

Why does <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> us to this <S%H776>land,<s%> to <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword?<s%> Our <S%H802>wives<s%> and our little <S%H2945>ones<s%> will be a <S%H957>prey:<s%> <S%H2896>wouldn't<s%> it be better for us to <S%H7725>return<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt?<s%>"
They <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another,<s%> "Let us <S%H5414>make<s%> a <S%H7218>captain,<s%> and let us <S%H7725>return<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>"

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on their <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> all the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> and <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh,<s%> who were of those who <S%H8446>spied<s%> out the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H7167>tore<s%> their <S%H899>clothes:<s%>

and they <S%H559>spoke<s%> to all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "The <S%H776>land,<s%> which we <S%H5674>passed<s%> through to <S%H8446>spy<s%> it <S%H3966>out,<s%> is an exceeding <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>

If <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2654>delights<s%> in <S%H935>us,<s%> then he will bring us into this <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> it to <S%H776>us;<s%> a land which <S%H2100>flows<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey.<s%>

Only <S%H4775>don't<s%> rebel against <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> neither <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land;<s%> for they are <S%H3899>bread<s%> for <S%H6738>us:<s%> their defense is <S%H5493>removed<s%> from over <S%H3068>them,<s%> and Yahweh is with <S%H3372>us.<s%> Don't fear them."

But all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H559>threatened<s%> to <S%H7275>stone<s%> them with <S%H7275>stones.<s%> The <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> in the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting<s%> to all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "How long will this <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5006>despise<s%> <S%H3808>me?<s%> and how long will they not <S%H539>believe<s%> in <S%H226>me,<s%> for all the signs which I have <S%H6213>worked<s%> among <S%H7130>them?<s%>

I will <S%H5221>strike<s%> them with the <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> and <S%H3423>disinherit<s%> <S%H6213>them,<s%> and will make of you a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H1419>greater<s%> and mightier than <S%H6099>they.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "Then the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> will <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H5927>it;<s%> for you brought up this <S%H5971>people<s%> in your <S%H3581>might<s%> from among <S%H7130>them;<s%>

and they will <S%H559>tell<s%> it to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of this <S%H776>land.<s%> They have <S%H8085>heard<s%> that you <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> are in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of this <S%H5971>people;<s%> for you <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> are <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H5869>face<s%> to <S%H5869>face,<s%> and your <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H5975>stands<s%> over <S%H1980>them,<s%> and you go <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5982>them,<s%> in a pillar of <S%H6051>cloud<s%> by <S%H3119>day,<s%> and in a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night.<s%>

Now if you <S%H4191>killed<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%> as <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> then the <S%H1471>nations<s%> which have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H8088>fame<s%> of you will <S%H559>speak,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3068><s%> 'Because Yahweh was <S%H1115>not<s%> <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> which he <S%H7650>swore<s%> to <S%H7819>them,<s%> therefore he has slain them in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>'
Now please let the <S%H3581>power<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> be <S%H1431>great,<s%> <S%H834>according<s%> as you have <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3068><s%> 'Yahweh is slow to <S%H750>anger,<s%> and <S%H7227>abundant<s%> in loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> <S%H5375>forgiving<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> and <S%H6588>disobedience;<s%> and that will by no <S%H5352>means<s%> <S%H5352>clear<s%> the <S%H6485>guilty,<s%> visiting the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> on the <S%H1121>children,<s%> on the <S%H8029>third<s%> and on the fourth <S%H7256>generation.<s%>'

Please <S%H5545>pardon<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of this <S%H5971>people<s%> according to the <S%H1433>greatness<s%> of your loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> and according as you have <S%H5375>forgiven<s%> this <S%H5971>people,<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> even until <S%H2008>now.<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "I have <S%H5545>pardoned<s%> according to your <S%H1697>word:<s%>
but in very <S%H199>deed,<s%> as I <S%H2416>live,<s%> and as all the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%>

because all those <S%H582>men<s%> who have <S%H7200>seen<s%> my <S%H3519>glory,<s%> and my <S%H226>signs,<s%> which I <S%H6213>worked<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> yet have <S%H5254>tempted<s%> me these <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H6471>times,<s%> and have not <S%H8085>listened<s%> to my <S%H6963>voice;<s%>

surely they shall <S%H518>not<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> neither shall any of those who <S%H5006>despised<s%> me see <S%H7200>it:<s%>

but my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3612>Caleb,<s%> <S%H6118>because<s%> he had <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> with <S%H310>him,<s%> and has followed me <S%H4390>fully,<s%> him will I <S%H935>bring<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> into which he <S%H935>went;<s%> and his <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall possess <S%H3423>it.<s%>

Now the <S%H6003>Amalekite<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley:<s%> <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> <S%H6437>turn,<s%> and <S%H5265>go<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea.<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"How long shall I bear with this <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> that <S%H3885>murmur<s%> against <S%H8085>me?<s%> I have heard the <S%H8519>murmurings<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which they murmur against <S%H3885>me.<s%>
<S%H559>Tell<s%> <S%H2416>them,<s%> 'As I live, <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> surely <S%H3808>as<s%> you have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in my <S%H241>ears,<s%> so will I do to <S%H6213>you:<s%>

your dead <S%H6297>bodies<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> in this <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> and all who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4557>you,<s%> according to your whole number, from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> who have murmured against <S%H3885>me,<s%>

surely you shall <S%H518>not<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H776>land,<s%> concerning which I <S%H3027>swore<s%> that I would make you <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H3612>therein,<s%> except Caleb the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh,<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun.<s%>

But your little <S%H2945>ones,<s%> that you <S%H559>said<s%> should be a <S%H957>prey,<s%> them will I bring <S%H935>in,<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which you have <S%H3988>rejected.<s%>
But as for <S%H6297>you,<s%> your dead bodies shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> in this <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

Your <S%H1121>children<s%> shall be <S%H7462>wanderers<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> your <S%H2184>prostitution,<s%> until your dead <S%H6297>bodies<s%> be <S%H8552>consumed<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

After the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H3117>days<s%> in which you <S%H8446>spied<s%> out the <S%H776>land,<s%> even <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> for every <S%H3117>day<s%> a <S%H3117>year,<s%> you will <S%H5375>bear<s%> your <S%H5771>iniquities,<s%> even <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and you will <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H8569>alienation.<s%>'

<S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh, have <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> <S%H518>surely<s%> this will I <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2063>to<s%> all this <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> who are gathered <S%H3259>together<s%> against <S%H4057>me:<s%> in this wilderness they shall be <S%H8552>consumed,<s%> and there they shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>"

The <S%H582>men,<s%> whom <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H8446>spy<s%> out the <S%H776>land,<s%> who <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and made all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> to <S%H3885>murmur<s%> against <S%H3318>him,<s%> by bringing up an evil <S%H1681>report<s%> against the <S%H776>land,<s%>

even <S%H582>those<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> who brought <S%H3318>up<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1681>report<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> by the <S%H4046>plague<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

But <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> and <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh,<s%> remained <S%H2421>alive<s%> of those <S%H1992>men<s%> who <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H8446>spy<s%> out the <S%H776>land.<s%>
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>told<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%> to all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H56>mourned<s%> <S%H3966>greatly.<s%>

They rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> we are <S%H5927>here,<s%> and will go up to the <S%H4725>place<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H559>promised:<s%> for we have <S%H2398>sinned.<s%>"
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Why now do you <S%H5674>disobey<s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> since it shall not <S%H6743>prosper?<s%>
<S%H5927>Don't<s%> go up, for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7130>isn't<s%> among <S%H5062>you;<s%> that you not be struck down <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

For there the <S%H6003>Amalekite<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> are <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5307>you,<s%> and you shall fall by the <S%H2719>sword:<s%> because you are <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H310>back<s%> from following <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> therefore Yahweh will not be with <S%H3068>you.<s%>"

But they <S%H6075>presumed<s%> to go <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain:<s%> nevertheless the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H4185>didn't<s%> depart <S%H4185>out<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

Then the <S%H6003>Amalekite<s%> came <S%H3381>down,<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in that <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> them and <S%H3807>beat<s%> them <S%H2767>down,<s%> even to Hormah.
